remarks: The orthocomplement of a co-atom is an atom not under it.  Provides a convenient construction when we need the existence of any object with this property.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Feb-2014.)
statement:
lhpocnel2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpocnel2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhpocnel2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpocnel2.p $e |- P = ( ( oc ` K ) ` W ) $.
lhpocnel2 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) $.
